description: Convert a PPM image to an ANSI ISO 6429 ASCII image. See also: ppmtoascii, pbmtoascii, pbmto4425. More information: https://netpbm.sourceforge.net/doc/ppmtoterm.html.

useCases.description: Convert a PPM image to an ANSI ISO 6429 ASCII image, mapping each pixel to an individual character:
